response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a competitive price of $950,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise, aiming to ensure both parties' satisfaction while maximizing the value for you. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and financial planning. I look forward to the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
